data.title: Science Fiction and Fantasy Reading Experience: L. Sprague De Camp
data.text:
Pen-names: Lyman R. Lyon

Scroll down for fiction reviews and ratings:

"The Gnarly Man"

© Unknown, Jun 1939

Fantastic Story Magazine, Jul 1953

The Wheels Of If, 1948

A humorous story about an immortal Neanderthal. He goes through life avoiding trouble, so he has a lot of knowledge about the small things in history.

review: 01-Jul-06 (read in 2002)

----------------------------------------------------------------------------

"Hyperpilosity"

© Astounding, Apr 1938

The Wheels of If, 1948

----------------------------------------------

"The Incorrigible"

(Johnny Black)

© Astounding Stories, 1939

--/ cool sf story

These were the times when L. Sprague de Camp was writing breezy, funny and light-hearted, with little ambition getting in a way of the story. Simple and (still pretty average) fare.
